title: 95/231/EC: Commission Decision of 20 June 1995 relating to protection measures concerning trichinosis
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 20 June 1995 relating to protection measures  concerning trichinosis (95/231/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Member States shall amend the measures which apply to trade so as to bring them into  compliance with this Decision. They shall immediately inform the Commission thereof.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 June 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
